Hi again Keith welcome to the group. Great test file. That one I hear
   
  "the group testing - with him"
   
  You are right it does take some getting used to but it doesnt take long to get the idea.
   
  Misty

Keith Clark <keith@...> wrote:
            Hello, Keith here.
   
  Finally took the time to join the board, am aware of some interesting stuff going on here. I'm very interested in the sweep tuning method I've heard so much about. 
   
  I tried it today, manually sweeping AM band. Takes a little getting used to.....
   
  Here's the one part that stuck out to me.
   
  Keith
